description: The line height in pixels for text nodes

critical_rules.rule: Always set explicit line-height for TEXT nodes
critical_rules.reason: Browser default line-height (~1.2) differs from Figma's explicit value
critical_rules.impact: Text height mismatch of 2-4px per line

critical_rules.rule: Tight line-heights (100% of font-size) may clip descenders
critical_rules.reason: Characters like g, j, p, q, y have descenders extending below baseline

example.behavior: Descenders may extend 1-2px below the line-height box

critical_rules.rule: DO NOT use overflow:hidden to 'fix' text height
critical_rules.reason: This clips descenders instead of fixing the root cause
critical_rules.correct_approach: Accept that browser may need 1-2px more for descenders, or use 120%+ line-height

typography_best_practices.tight_line_height: 100% (lineHeightPx === fontSize) - only for single-line labels without descenders

font_metrics.ascender: Part of letter above x-height (d, h, l, etc.)
font_metrics.descender: Part of letter below baseline (g, j, p, q, y)

validation.check: If lineHeightPx === fontSize (100%), warn about potential descender clipping
